sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Reveal from "react-reveal/Reveal"; import ChilliChatka from '../../../assets/chillichatka.jpg'; import Cool from '../../../assets/cool.jpg'; import style from './homepage.scss'; const Homepage = (props) => { return ( <>

Dear Amisha Gyani

Before you go ahead, I want you to think of the best moment in your life. Aage mat badh, pehle soch ki konsa moment hai that is your definition of happiness. Socha? Pakka soch liya? Am I a part of that moment? Now the reason I asked you to do this is because, I promise you ki I will always keep you this much happy. I love you so much that I want to make your every day more memorable than the previous one. This gift is just one of my effort in this direction. I hope you like it. I love you!

The Chilli Chatka Face

This picture here is the classic chilli chatka face of amisha gyani. Let's admit, if she loves anything in this world more than me is chilli chatka. I can't understand how can a kurkure flavour make her happy so much. To be honest, I think if anyone ever fights with her and then just bring her a packet of this kurkure she will just forget everything and eat it like a small baby. Now you must be thinking ki ye toh exaggerate kiya hai , itna thodi na koi karta hai, let me tell you, her insta bio once was 'Chill Chatka'. I know, it makes no sense par mai kya karu, ye hai na aisi. But the thing is, I love this nature of her. She is such a cute baby ki choti choti cheezon me bhi itna khush hoti hai. I love her quality of finding happiness in every thing. I promise to always make you happy like this pack of chill chatka, or should I say I promise to be your packet of Chilli Chatka.

The Bachpan se Cool Amisha

Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha, look at that face...hahahahahahahahahahaha kya yar amisha bohot hi khatarnak hai tu.
) } export default Homepage;
